thought: The Slack message post action currently has no parameters set. I need to implement its parameters to send messages to the #news channel with the required message format.
plan: Set channelId mode to 'name' and value to 'news' to target #news channel.
Set messageType to 'text' for simple text messages.
Set text parameter to a JavaScript expression that formats the message as '[i] [news]' where i is the incremental index and news is the news headline.
criticism: Without proper parameters, Slack messages cannot be sent to the correct channel or with the correct format.

tool_input.comments: Send messages to Slack channel #news with formatted text including index and news title.
